title: Obagi System Professional-C 20% Vitamin C Serum, 1-Ounce Bottle (30ml)
description: Professional-C serum with Vitamin C neutralizes free radicals at all layers of the skin, before they damage skin cells and accelerate aging. Provides superior antioxidant protection with deep penetration. Obagi Professional-C Serum 20% is suitable for all skin types.

title: OBAGI Nu-Derm exfoderm forte exfoliation enhancer net wt. 2.oz.
description: Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte -- 2 oz.Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte is an alpha-hydroxy acid that removes old skin cells while promoting new skin cells for a lighter, brighter, firmer complexion. Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte is for skin that needs deeper exfoliation.6% glycolic acid, 4% lactic acidPenetrates deep into the skinReturns skin to a soft, beautiful, comfortable state of balanceEspecially Suited For:Normal and oily skinEssential Elements:Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte comes in a 2-oz. bottle.For Best Effect:Apply Exfoderm Forte in a thin layer to the skin once a day or as directed by a physician.
